text: All is reduced to dust on the wind.
Like a spark spreading through a wooden shack on a dry day, catastrophe is imminent unless drastic measures are taken.
A warrior cannot be protected by a punctured shield.
Even a suit of armour will not save a soldier without confidence and zeal.
The best offense is a good defense.
Even the fangs of a tiger shatter against the turtle's shell.
Not even the wrath of the Heavens can shake the foundations of the opposing Black Mountains.
[[b]] Impenetrable [[/b]] can be increased by winning defensive battles.
[[b]] Impenetrable [[/b]] can be decreased by losing battles
